sect2.title: Installation of Lfs-Utils
sect2.para: The meaning of the configure option:

listitem.para: --with-libc: This causes the mktemp program to use the mkstemp and mkdtemp functions from the system C library.

sect2.para: Now copy two supporting files included in the Lfs-Utils tarball to their destination:
The /etc/services file is used to resolve service numbers to human-readable names, and the /etc/protocols does the same for protocol numbers.
